'''Memories''' are [[Constellation Activation Material]] items used to activate the [[Constellations]] of the [[Traveler]]'s different elements.

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Memories}}

==Trivia==
* The sources for [[Memory of Roving Gales]] and [[Memory of Immovable Crystals]] do not include [[Statues of The Seven]], while later ones do.
* [[Traveler (Pyro)|Pyro aligned Traveler]] is the first and so far only alignment to not use Memories at all, instead activating Constellations through [[Primal Flame Resonance]].
